body.name: Force1 Tornado LED Remote Control Car for Kids - Double Sided Fast RC Car, 4WD Off-Road Stunt Car with 360 Flips, All Terrain Tires, LEDs, Rechargeable Toy Car Batteries, and Easy Remote

Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 47 mins
features: LED RC Stunt Car for Kids: Drive the Tornado RC car upside down or downside up; this remote control car features 2-sided off-road driving, bright LEDs, and tough all-terrain rubber tires

Easy 2.4GHz No-Interference Control: Take control with the easy remote transmitter and watch this remote control car perform 360° flips, spins, and turns with a push of a button; anti-interference feature lets you drive multiple RC cars at once

Shockproof 2-Sided RC Crawler Car Toy: This high speed RC car races on both sides and features grippy rubber tires for endless off road racing on any terrain; see this remote control car spin on 2 wheels as it lights up with vibrant LEDs in Tornado mode

Rechargeable Remote Control Car: This small, portable remote car measures 6” L x 5.5” W x 3.25” H and includes a USB charging cable, 1 removable rechargeable battery (25 minutes play time for every 180 minutes charge time), and a 2.4 GHz remote with 2 AA batteries included

Durable and Quality Assured: The Tornado LED remote control car is a tough offroad RC crawler that’s easy and super fun for kids ages 6 and up; We’ll provide a full refund if you’re not completely thrilled with this fun RC car for boys and girls

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EASY 2.4GHz REMOTE TRANSMITTER Drive, race, rumble, and tumble this RC car for kids with the easy-to-use 2.4GHz joystick remote transmitter. Easy directional controls and 1 button spins and stunts make this a super fun remote control car for kids. DOUBLE SIDED DRIVING See this high speed RC rock crawler drive top or bottom, tumble on tall obstacles, and perform multi-directional pivots, spins, turns, and drifts. COMPLETE RC TOY CAR KIT This rechargeable remote control car measures 6” L x 5.5” W x 3.5” H and includes a USB charging cable, 1 rechargeable RC car battery, and a 2.4 GHz remote with 2 AA batteries included.

MULTI-TERRAIN DRIVING The Tornado LED RC Stunt Car rolls on thermoplastic rubber tires for multi-surface driving on tile, hardwood, carpet, asphalt, multiple indoor and outdoor surfaces. 360° TORNADO SPINS Featuring a unique chassis, the Tornado whirls and twirls like no other! Watch this RC stunt car spin on 2 wheels, both ways, and light up with bright LEDs. CONTENTS Tornado LED RC Stunt Car2.4 GHz Remote Transmitter with 2 AA Batteries Included1 x Rechargeable Li-ion Battery 3.7V 18500 1200mAhUSB Charging CableCharge Time: 180 MinutesPlay Time: 25 to 30 MinutesPlease allow your RC toy to rest for at least 10 minutes before recharging

Tornado RC Car Crawler Tornado+ Tornado Red Mini Tornado RC Crawler Cyclone LED RC Car Highlighted Feature (more features shown on each listing) Tornado Mode Interactive Display Spins “Zoom”, “Spin”, “Race”, “Stunt” and “Speed" Tornado Mode Ultra Fast Mini Racer 2 Sided Flips and Tricks Tire Types Multi-Terrain Rubber Tires Multi-Terrain Rubber Tires Multi-Terrain Rubber Tires Multi-Terrain Rubber Tires Multi-Terrain Rubber Tires With Bright LED Lights Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes 360° Stunts & Spins Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes Remote Control Included Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes Can Drive Multiple Cars at Once Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes No. of Rechargeable Battery Included 1 1 1 1 2 Charging Time (approx. per battery) 180 minutes 180 Minutes 180 Minutes 10 to 15 minutes 90 minutes Play Time (approx. per battery) 25 to 30 minutes 25 to 30 minutes 25 minutes 8 to 12 minutes 20 minutes Recommended Age 6+ 6+ 6+ 6+ 6+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars durable and fun
reviews.reviewText: my 3- year-old son loves his new toy. it takes a while for him to able to make the car spinning using the remote but it is so much fun for him. But the battery doesnt last so long. We need to charge it after 30 min or so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's fun, it's a great gift. It isn't that easy to charge, and you'll still need AA batteries for the remote control. However, it's easy to manage, children learn fast how to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality and performance
reviews.reviewText: I bought this one and another model for my two grandsons who are 9 and 10 years old. I charged the batteries and ran them myself to see how they performed before wrapping them up and was impressed with the overall quality and performance. The boys opened them excitedly and had them running and flipping over and running upside down, spinning around, and doing tricks I could hardly imagine. They love them and I would recommend them to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap Chinesium, but still fun
reviews.reviewText: The tires are made of a hard, cheap rubber that does not provide very good traction indoors (works ok on carpet, but just does burn outs on hardwood/linoleum). Has that cheap, Chinese plastic smell to it. Also, the remote does not recognize pressure sensitivity on the joysticks, they simply work as on/off switches for the wheels. Couple this with the poor traction, and you really can’t control the thing with any degree of precision. It’s just best for making lots of donuts or for thrashing around.However, with all those things said, my kids love this toy. The construction is of a pretty good quality so it is durable, and seems that it will survive at least a few weeks of abuse. The battery also lasts a good long while… not sure how many charges we’ll get out of it, but I doubt that it’s novelty will last long enough for that to be an issue.All in all, I would say this is a good toy for little kids, age 3 to 7 or something like that. Once they get older they’ll probably want something more sophisticated. I would probably buy it again just because it is so affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandsons Love the Tornado Spin!
reviews.reviewText: Reviewing the Force 1 Tornado +. I got this as an extra gift for my grandson at the last minute. He, and my other grandson LOVE it. They really like making it spin, and spin, and spin. The lights are cool and it seems to be pretty durable. I can't say how this will stand the test of time but for now, it's a hit. Nice size and flashy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic customer service. Super fun product!
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my niece’s 5th birthday and not only does she love it, but so does her 2 year old sister! It’s a little hard to control but even for me. The kids loves the spin feature. My order was missing a piece but I reached out to support to responded immediately and shipped out a replacement piece that arrived within a couple days. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Above expectations for the price
reviews.reviewText: It is really enjoyable car, quick sprint, takes hits quite well. It fell 3 times from main floor to basement and nothing happened, it still works great. My kids (2 and 4 yrs) enjoy it so much, making it spinning around. For this price, I definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fun car, terrible battery
reviews.reviewText: My son has had a lot of fun with this car but unfortunately the battery drains quickly and the charger has stopped working. We have tried it in multiple usb outlets and it won’t charge anywhere. We have only had the car a few days.
